Parameter.description: Application id, like qisme or kiwari-prod. Please don't input any string with spaces, it just alphanumeric only

title: Delete Application
name: DeleteApplication
description: For security reason, admin can only destroy their own application. Admin can't delete other application even if he was created that application.

description: It will return user total, registered user per month, chat total, chat per month, chat per type (single or group)

It is official group chat or not

title: Get Group Chat Info By Qiscus Room Id
name: GroupChatInfo

Parameter.description: Unique_id is combination of app_id, creator (official) qiscus_email, app_id using # as separator. For example unique_id = "kiwari-prod#userid_001_62812345678987@kiwari-prod.com#kiwari-prod"

title: Post Comment
description: Send message to SDK through Qisme engine
name: PostComment

Parameter.description: Chat room id which will be post
User id to be add as contact
Contact id to be added as favourite

Possible value is: all to show all user within this application, contact to show only their contact, official to only show official account. If you don't send any parameter, it will be use previous logic, where only and exclude parameter stills work, otherwise that two parameter will not work.
Possible value is: official. If you use this parameter (only=official) you will only see official account member.
Possible value is: official. If you use this parameter (exclude=official) you will see all contact except official account.
User id to be deleted as contact
Contact id to be deleted from favourites

title: Search User
description: Search user to be added as contact
name: SearchUser

title: Search User by Email
description: Search user by registered email to be added as contact
name: SearchUserByEmail

title: Search User by Qiscus Email
description: Search user to be added as contact using qiscus email, only used in particular condition, not for adding contact
name: SearchUserByQiscusEmail

title: Sync Contact From Phone Book
description: sync all phone number in user phone contact to be contact in qisme application client (mobile) will post an array of phone number, qisme engine will return all contact included added contact
name: SyncPhoneContact

Parameter.description: Array of normalized phone number, for instance: phone_number[]=+62...&phone_number[]=+62...

title: Upload File

Parameter.description: Phone number to be register or sign in
Post media, must be an array of file. This is optional.
Url media to share or included in post media. This is optional.
Link meta should contain pre-fetch data such as title or caption. This must be valid JSON string, otherwise will return error
Comment text content. Maximum length of comment is 400 character
Comment media, must be an array of file. This is optional.

title: Delete Own Comment
description: Only Own Comment and Own Post Can Delete Comment
name: DeleteComment

title: Delete Posts
description: Delete Post, only post owner can delete a post. This is alias for delete /api/v1/me/post/:post_id
name: DeletePost

Parameter.description: You can show media as an object (will return first media), or as an array (will retun array of media). Default is return object. Possible value is array or object.

title: Logout session
description: This endpoint to ensure there are not trash data in auth_sessions table, since all jwt token are now saved in database, it better to delete it manually
name: LogoutSession

title: Delete My Session
description: Delete session. You cannot delete current session, if you want to destroy current session use GET /api/v1/me/logout instead.
name: Me

title: List My Active Session
description: Get all active session except current session for this user to force logout
name: Me

title: Update Profile
name: UpdateProfile
description:
Before updating user's email or phone number, system will check whether there are no another user who have same email/phone number except current user. Why this should be considered? For example there are 2 user: A and B registered in same application (id). A register using phone number, let say 123. B register using email, let say b@mail.com.

Now, image if we don't check anything about data existense and let A to update his profile email to b@mail.com and let B to update their phone number to 123 (actually it can't be done because of db validation). It will be result strange behaviour in login method, since it just using one parameter, either email or phone number.

Now, A have: 123, b@mail.com and B have: 123, b@mail.com It's the same data, and please forget about how it can be B know A's phone number or how it can A know B's email? The point is, it will led system have duplicate data (even it can't be done because of database validation). As we expected, when B try to login he will get authentication using id A. And when A try to login it will be A.

Parameter.description: Minimum 4 char maximum 20 char (as mentioned in specification https://quip.com/EafhASIYmym3)
Secondary phone number (this is for buddygo support)

title: Create room with unique id
description: Create room with unique id. It's for buddygo support. This room called public chat room
name: CreateRoomWithUniqueId

Parameter.description: Valid user_id to be create room with unique id

title: Login or Register using Server Key
description: Register user if not exist, otherwise only send passcode via email
name: LoginOrRegisterEmail

Parameter.description: Valid email to be register or sign in
Valid name to be register or sign in
Valid phone_number to be register or sign in
Is_official = 'true' or 'false' Set true if you want to create an official account
Valid avatar_url to be register or sign in. It's optional
Call_event = 'incoming', 'accept', 'end', 'cancel', 'reject'. incoming and cancel send from caller user. accept, reject send from callee user. end can be send from caller and callee user.

title: Check Mobile Apps Version
description: Check latest mobile apps version in database (for force update)
name: CheckMobileAppsVersion

Parameter.description: Application version number (can be in version format like '1.1.1')

title: Create Mobile Apps Version
description: Update or create mobile version to force update
name: MobileAppsVersionCreate

title: General Callback

description: Akan mengembalikan payload yang kemudian dikirim ke callback_url, kembalian dari callback url akan diproses/langsung dikirim sebagai post comment, lihat kelas CallbackBotPostcommentWorker

Parameter.description: Callback message type, must be sent in request body
Application id where this callback should be processed
